alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 25 at 9:05PM EDT until September 27 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM TUESDAY TO 3 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level is expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...The tidal Delaware River and its tidal tributaries. * WHEN...From 10:00 PM Tuesday until 3:00 AM Wednesday. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional lingering minor tidal flooding is possible from late Tuesday night into Wednesday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware River at Philadelphia MLLW Categories - Minor 8.2 ft, Moderate 9.2 ft, Major 10.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 25/11 PM 7.9 1.2 0.8 None 26/12 PM 7.5 0.8 1.3 None 27/12 AM 8.9 2.2 1.6 Minor 27/01 PM 8.1 1.4 1.5 None 28/01 AM 8.6 1.9 1.2 Minor 28/01 PM 7.9 1.2 1.0 None Delaware River at Burlington MLLW Categories - Minor 9.3 ft, Moderate 10.3 ft, Major 11.3 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 26/12 AM 8.9 1.2 0.8 None 26/01 PM 8.5 0.8 1.3 None 27/01 AM 9.8 2.1 1.4 Minor 27/01 PM 9.1 1.4 1.2 None 28/02 AM 9.8 2.1 1.1 Minor 28/02 PM 9.2 1.5 0.8 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
